name: "The Room" Prototype Level
description:
Controls:

W,S,A,D = Move

E = Interact with Objects

Here is the Prototype level for my final year project at LIT Clonmel

This game tells the story of Dan Morley.

Dan Morley wakes up in a mysterious room, unsure of his surroundings Dan slowly begins to realise not everything is as it seems. As the player you will be thrust into mind of someone suffering from PTSD.

Explore the complicated mind of Dan Morley, solve puzzles and gather clues to uncover the mystery of The Room.
